00126 void EnterIMPBeginScreen( void )
00127 {
00128 
00129       // reset all variables
00130       
00131       memset( pFullNameString, 0, sizeof( pFullNameString ) );
00132   memset( pNickNameString, 0, sizeof( pNickNameString ) );
00133   
00134       // if we are not restarting...then copy over name, set cursor and array positions
00135       if( iCurrentProfileMode != IMP__REGISTRY )
00136       {
00137         wcscpy( pFullNameString, pFullName );
00138         wcscpy( pNickNameString, pNickName );
00139             uiFullNameCharacterPosition = wcslen( pFullNameString );
00140     uiNickNameCharacterPosition = wcslen( pNickNameString );
00141         uiFullNameCursorPosition = 196 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + StringPixLength( pFullNameString, FONT14ARIAL );
00142     uiNickNameCursorPosition = 196 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + StringPixLength( pNickNameString, FONT14ARIAL );
00143         
00144             // set gender too
00145             bGenderFlag = fCharacterIsMale;
00146       
00147       }
00148   else
00149       {
00150             uiNickNameCursorPosition =196 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
00151     uiFullNameCursorPosition =196 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
00152             uiFullNameCharacterPosition = 0;
00153             uiNickNameCharacterPosition = 0;
00154             bGenderFlag = -1;
00155       }
00156 
00157 
00158       
00159   
00160       ubTextEnterMode =0;
00161 
00162       // draw name if any
00163       fNewCharInString = TRUE;
00164       
00165       
00166       // render the screen on entry
00167   RenderIMPBeginScreen( );
00168 
00169   if( fFinishedCharGeneration )
00170       {
00171     ubTextEnterMode = 5;
00172       }
00173       else
00174       {
00175             fFirstIMPAttribTime = TRUE;
00176       }
00177 
00178       // create mouse regions
00179       CreateIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions( );
00180 
00181       // create buttons needed for begin screen
00182       CreateIMPBeginScreenButtons( );
00183 
00184   return;
00185 }

00188 {

00193       RenderButton4Image( 64, 118 );      
00194       RenderButton4Image( 64, 178 );
00195       RenderButton4Image( 64, 238 );
00196 
00197       // the begin screen indents
00198   RenderBeginIndent( 105, 58);
00199 
00200       // full name indent
00201       RenderNameIndent( 194, 132);
00202 
00203       // nick name
00204   RenderNickNameIndent( 194, 192);
00205 
00206 
00207       // gender indents
00208       RenderGenderIndent( 192, 252 );
00209       RenderGenderIndent( 302, 252 );
00210   
00211       // render warning string
00212       Print8CharacterOnlyString( );
00213   
00214 
00215 
00216       // display player name
00217       DisplayPlayerFullNameString( );
00218       DisplayPlayerNickNameString( );
00219       RenderMaleGenderIcon( );
00220       RenderFemaleGenderIcon( );
00221             
00222       // the gender itself
00223       RenderGender( );
00224       
00225       return;
00226 }

00228 void ExitIMPBeginScreen( void )
00229 {
00230   
00231       // remove buttons
00232   RemoveIMPBeginScreenButtons( );
00233 
00234   // remove mouse regions
00235       DestroyIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions( );
00236 
00237       wcscpy( pFullName, pFullNameString );
00238       
00239       // is nick name too long?..shorten
00240       if( wcslen( pNickNameString ) > 8 )
00241       {
00242             // null out char 9
00243             pNickNameString[ 8 ] = 0;
00244       }
00245 
00246 
00247       wcscpy( pNickName, pNickNameString );
00248   
00249       // set gender
00250       fCharacterIsMale = bGenderFlag;
00251 
00252       return;
00253 }

00255 
00256 void HandleIMPBeginScreen( void )
00257 {
00258 
00259       GetPlayerKeyBoardInputForIMPBeginScreen( );
00260 
00261             // has a new char been added to activation string
00262   
00263 
00264 
00265       // render the cursor
00266       switch( ubTextEnterMode )
00267       {
00268             case( FULL_NAME_MODE ):
00269               DisplayFullNameStringCursor( );
00270             break;
00271             case( NICK_NAME_MODE ):
00272               DisplayNickNameStringCursor( );
00273             break;
00274             case( MALE_GENDER_SELECT ):
00275               DisplayMaleGlowCursor( );
00276             break;
00277             case( FEMALE_GENDER_SELECT ):
00278               DisplayFemaleGlowCursor( ); 
00279             break;
00280       }
00281       
00282       if( fNewCharInString )
00283       {     
00284             // display strings 
00285     DisplayPlayerFullNameString( );                   
00286     DisplayPlayerNickNameString( );
00287             RenderMaleGenderIcon( );
00288             RenderFemaleGenderIcon( );
00289             
00290             // the gender itself
00291         RenderGender( );
00292       }
00293 
00294   return;
00295 }

00299 {
00300   // this procedure will create the buttons needed for the IMP BeginScreen
00301 
00302       // ths done button
00303   giIMPBeginScreenButtonImage[0]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\button_2.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00304 /*    giIMPBeginScreenButton[0] = QuickCreateButton( giIMPBeginScreenButtonImage[0], LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 134 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 314 ),
00305                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
00306                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPBeginScreenDoneCallback);
00307   */
00308 
00309       giIMPBeginScreenButton[0] = CreateIconAndTextButton( giIMPBeginScreenButtonImage[ 0 ], pImpButtonText[ 6 ], FONT12ARIAL, 
00310                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00311                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00312                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00313                                                                                      LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 134 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 314 ), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00314                                                                                      BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPBeginScreenDoneCallback);
00315 
00316       SetButtonCursor(giIMPBeginScreenButton[0], CURSOR_WWW);
00317       return;
00318 
00319 }

00334 
00335 void BtnIMPBeginScreenDoneCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00336 {
00337 
00338       // easter egg check
00339       BOOLEAN fEggOnYouFace = FALSE;
00340 
00341       // btn callback for IMP Begin Screen done button
00342       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00343             return;
00344 
00345       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00346       {
00347              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00348       }
00349       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00350       {
00351             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00352             {
00353       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00354 
00355                   
00356                   if( fFinishedCharGeneration )
00357                   {
00358                         // simply reviewing name and gender, exit to finish page
00359                         iCurrentImpPage = IMP_FINISH;
00360                         fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00361                         return;
00362                   }
00363                   else
00364                   {
00365                     if( CheckCharacterInputForEgg( ) )
00366                         {
00367                               fEggOnYouFace = TRUE;
00368                         }
00369                   }
00370 
00371 
00372                   // back to mainpage
00373                   
00374 
00375                   // check to see if a name has been selected, if not, do not allow player to proceed with more char generation
00376                   if( ( pFullNameString[ 0 ] != 0) && ( pFullNameString[ 0 ] != L' ' ) && ( bGenderFlag != -1 ) )
00377                   {
00378                         // valid full name, check to see if nick name
00379                         if( ( pNickNameString[ 0 ] == 0 ) || ( pNickNameString[ 0 ] == L' '))
00380                         {
00381                               // no nick name
00382                               // copy first name to nick name
00383           CopyFirstNameIntoNickName( );
00384                         }
00385                         // ok, now set back to main page, and set the fact we have completed part 1
00386                         if ( ( iCurrentProfileMode < IMP__PERSONALITY ) &&( bGenderFlag != -1 ) )
00387                         {
00388                           iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__PORTRAIT;//IMP__PERSONALITY;
00389                         }
00390                         else if( bGenderFlag == -1 )
00391                         {
00392                               iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__REGISTRY;
00393                         }
00394                         // no easter egg?...then proceed along
00395                         if( fEggOnYouFace == FALSE )
00396                         {
00397                           iCurrentImpPage = IMP_MAIN_PAGE;
00398           fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00399                         }
00400 
00401                   }
00402                   else
00403                   {
00404                         // invalid name, reset current mode
00405                         DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_IMP_STYLE, pImpPopUpStrings[ 2 ], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
00406                         iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__REGISTRY;      
00407                   }
00408             }
00409       }     
00410 }

00417 
00418 void GetPlayerKeyBoardInputForIMPBeginScreen( void )
00419 {
00420       InputAtom                           InputEvent;
00421       POINT  MousePos;
00422 
00423       // get the current curosr position, might just need it.
00424       GetCursorPos(&MousePos);       
00425       
00426       // handle input events
00427   while( DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) )
00428   { 
00429        /*
00430             // HOOK INTO MOUSE HOOKS
00431     switch(InputEvent.usEvent)
00432             {
00433             
00434            case LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00435                     MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00436                break;
00437                case LEFT_BUTTON_UP:
00438                      MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y ,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00439                break;
00440                case RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00441                    MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00442                break;
00443                case RIGHT_BUTTON_UP: 
00444                      MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00445                break;
00446             }
00447             */
00448     if(     !HandleTextInput( &InputEvent ) && (InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN || InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_REPEAT) )
00449             {
00450               switch( InputEvent.usParam )
00451                   {
00452                   case (( ENTER )):
00453           // check to see if gender was highlighted..if so, select it
00454                       if( FEMALE_GENDER_SELECT  == ubTextEnterMode )
00455                               {
00456                              bGenderFlag = IMP_FEMALE;
00457                               }
00458                        else if( MALE_GENDER_SELECT  == ubTextEnterMode  )
00459                                {
00460                              bGenderFlag = IMP_MALE;
00461                                }
00462 
00463                        // increment to next selection box
00464                        IncrementTextEnterMode( );
00465                        fNewCharInString = TRUE;
00466                         break;
00467                   case( SPACE ):
00468                         // handle space bar
00469                         if( FEMALE_GENDER_SELECT  == ubTextEnterMode )
00470                         {
00471                           bGenderFlag = IMP_FEMALE;
00472                               DecrementTextEnterMode( );
00473                         }
00474                     else if( MALE_GENDER_SELECT  == ubTextEnterMode  )
00475                         {
00476                           bGenderFlag = IMP_MALE;
00477                               IncrementTextEnterMode( );
00478                         }
00479                         else
00480                         {
00481                               HandleBeginScreenTextEvent( InputEvent.usParam );
00482                         }
00483                         fNewCharInString = TRUE;
00484                         break;
00485                 case (( ESC )):
00486           LeaveLapTopScreen( );
00487                         break;
00488                         case (( TAB )):
00489                       // tab hit, increment to next selection box
00490           IncrementTextEnterMode( );
00491                   fNewCharInString = TRUE;
00492                           break;
00493                         case ( 265 ):
00494                           // tab and shift
00495                               DecrementTextEnterMode( );
00496                               fNewCharInString = TRUE;
00497                         break;
00498                         default:
00499                               HandleBeginScreenTextEvent( InputEvent.usParam );
00500                         break;
00501                   }
00502             }
00503   }
00504       return;
00505 }
00506 
00507 
00508 void HandleBeginScreenTextEvent( UINT32 uiKey )
00509 {
00510    // this function checks to see if a letter or a backspace was pressed, if so, either put char to screen
00511        // or delete it
00512 
00513   switch( uiKey )
00514       {
00515         case ( BACKSPACE ): 
00516             
00517                   switch( ubTextEnterMode )
00518                   {
00519                   case( FULL_NAME_MODE ):
00520                       if( uiFullNameCharacterPosition >= 0 )
00521                               {
00522             
00523                                         
00524                                     // decrement StringPosition
00525                             if( uiFullNameCharacterPosition > 0)
00526                                     {
00527                                      uiFullNameCharacterPosition-=1;
00528             }
00529                                     
00530 
00531                                     
00532 
00533                             // null out char
00534             pFullNameString[uiFullNameCharacterPosition] = 0;
00535         
00536                           // move cursor back by sizeof char
00537                                     uiFullNameCursorPosition = 196 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + StringPixLength( pFullNameString, FONT14ARIAL );
00538 
00539                             // string has been altered, redisplay
00540             fNewCharInString = TRUE;
00541                               }
00542                         break;
00543                     case ( NICK_NAME_MODE ):
00544                       if( uiNickNameCharacterPosition >= 0 )
00545                               {
00546 
00547                               
00548             // decrement StringPosition
00549                                     if( uiNickNameCharacterPosition > 0 )
00550                              uiNickNameCharacterPosition-=1;
00551    
00552                             // null out char
00553             pNickNameString[uiNickNameCharacterPosition] = 0;
00554         
00555                            // move cursor back by sizeof char
00556                                     uiNickNameCursorPosition = 196 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + StringPixLength( pNickNameString, FONT14ARIAL );
00557           
00558                             // string has been altered, redisplay
00559             fNewCharInString = TRUE;
00560                               }
00561                         
00562                     break;
00563                   }
00564             break;
00565 
00566         default:
00567           if( uiKey >= 'A' && uiKey <= 'Z' || 
00568                               uiKey >= 'a' && uiKey <= 'z' ||
00569                               uiKey >= '0' && uiKey <= '9' ||
00570                               uiKey == '_' || uiKey == '.' ||
00571                               uiKey == ' ' )
00572                   { 
00573                           // if the current string position is at max or great, do nothing
00574             switch( ubTextEnterMode )
00575                               {
00576                               case( FULL_NAME_MODE ):
00577                            if( uiFullNameCharacterPosition >= MAX_FULL_NAME )
00578                                            {
00579                                                  break;
00580                                            }
00581                                            else
00582                                            {
00583 
00584                                                  if(uiFullNameCharacterPosition < 1 )
00585                                                  {
00586                                            uiFullNameCharacterPosition = 0;
00587                                                  }
00588                                                  // make sure we haven't moved too far
00589                                                  if( ( uiFullNameCursorPosition + StringPixLength( ( CHAR16 *)&(uiKey ), FONT14ARIAL ) ) > (UINT32)FULL_NAME_REGION_WIDTH + 196 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X)
00590                                                  {
00591                                                        // do nothing for now, when pop up is in place, display
00592                                                        break;
00593                                                  }
00594                  // valid char, capture and convert to CHAR16
00595                  pFullNameString[uiFullNameCharacterPosition] = ( CHAR16 )uiKey;
00596                               
00597 
00598                                      // null out next char position
00599                                      pFullNameString[uiFullNameCharacterPosition + 1] = 0;
00600           
00601                                      // move cursor position ahead
00602                  uiFullNameCursorPosition = 196 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + StringPixLength( pFullNameString, FONT14ARIAL );
00603           
00604                                      // increment string position
00605                                      uiFullNameCharacterPosition +=1;
00606                         
00607                                  // string has been altered, redisplay
00608                  fNewCharInString = TRUE;
00609                                            }
00610                              break;
00611                          case ( NICK_NAME_MODE ):
00612                            if( uiNickNameCharacterPosition >= MAX_NICK_NAME )
00613                                            {
00614                                                  break;
00615                                            }
00616                                            else
00617                                            {
00618 
00619                                                  if(uiNickNameCharacterPosition == -1)
00620                                                  {
00621                                            uiNickNameCharacterPosition = 0;
00622                                                  }
00623 
00624                                                   // make sure we haven't moved too far
00625                                                  if( ( uiNickNameCursorPosition + StringPixLength( (CHAR16 *)&(uiKey ), FONT14ARIAL ) ) > (UINT32)NICK_NAME_REGION_WIDTH + 196 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X )
00626                                                  {
00627                                                        // do nothing for now, when pop up is in place, display
00628                                                        break;
00629                                                  }
00630 
00631                  // valid char, capture and convert to CHAR16
00632                  pNickNameString[uiNickNameCharacterPosition] = ( CHAR16 )uiKey;
00633                               
00634                                      // null out next char position
00635                                      pNickNameString[uiNickNameCharacterPosition + 1] = 0;
00636           
00637                                      // move cursor position ahead
00638                  uiNickNameCursorPosition = 196 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + StringPixLength( pNickNameString, FONT14ARIAL );
00639           
00640                                      // increment string position
00641                                      uiNickNameCharacterPosition +=1;
00642                         
00643                                  // string has been altered, redisplay
00644                  fNewCharInString = TRUE;
00645                                            }
00646                         
00647                          break;
00648                               }
00649                   }
00650              break;
00651       }                 
00652       return;
00653 }

00656 
00657 void DisplayFullNameStringCursor( void )
00658 {
00659       // this procdure will draw the activation string cursor on the screen at position cursorx cursory
00660   UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
00661       static UINT32 uiBaseTime = 0;
00662       UINT32 uiDeltaTime = 0;
00663   static UINT32 iCurrentState = 0;
00664   UINT8 *pDestBuf;
00665   static BOOLEAN fIncrement = TRUE;
00666 
00667       if(uiBaseTime == 0)
00668       {
00669             uiBaseTime = GetJA2Clock();
00670       }
00671       
00672       // get difference
00673       uiDeltaTime = GetJA2Clock() - uiBaseTime;
00674 
00675       // if difference is long enough, rotate colors
00676       if(uiDeltaTime > MIN_GLOW_DELTA)
00677   {
00678             if( iCurrentState == 10)
00679             {
00680               // start rotating downward
00681                   fIncrement = FALSE;
00682             }
00683             if( iCurrentState == 0)
00684             {
00685                   // rotate colors upward
00686                   fIncrement = TRUE;
00687             }
00688             // if increment upward, increment iCurrentState
00689     if(fIncrement)
00690             {
00691                   iCurrentState++;
00692             }
00693             else
00694             {
00695                   // else downwards
00696                   iCurrentState--;
00697             }
00698         // reset basetime to current clock
00699             uiBaseTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00700       }
00701 
00702 
00703       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
00704       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00705 
00706   // draw line in current state
00707       LineDraw(TRUE, (UINT16) uiFullNameCursorPosition, FULL_NAME_CURSOR_Y - 3, (UINT16)uiFullNameCursorPosition, FULL_NAME_CURSOR_Y + CURSOR_HEIGHT - 2, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( GlowColorsList[ iCurrentState ][ 0 ], GlowColorsList[ iCurrentState ][ 1 ], GlowColorsList[ iCurrentState ][ 2 ] ) ), 
00708                pDestBuf);
00709       
00710   InvalidateRegion((UINT16) uiFullNameCursorPosition, FULL_NAME_CURSOR_Y - 3 , (UINT16)uiFullNameCursorPosition + 1, FULL_NAME_CURSOR_Y + CURSOR_HEIGHT + 1 - 2);
00711  
00712       // unlock frame buffer
00713       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00714       return;
00715 }
00716 
00717 
00718 void DisplayNickNameStringCursor( void )
00719 {
00720       // this procdure will draw the activation string cursor on the screen at position cursorx cursory
00721   UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
00722       static UINT32 uiBaseTime = 0;
00723       UINT32 uiDeltaTime = 0;
00724       UINT8 *pDestBuf;
00725   static UINT32 iCurrentState = 0;
00726   static BOOLEAN fIncrement = TRUE;
00727 
00728       if(uiBaseTime == 0)
00729       {
00730             uiBaseTime = GetJA2Clock();
00731       }
00732       
00733       // get difference
00734       uiDeltaTime = GetJA2Clock() - uiBaseTime;
00735 
00736       // if difference is long enough, rotate colors
00737       if(uiDeltaTime > MIN_GLOW_DELTA)
00738   {
00739             if( iCurrentState == 10)
00740             {
00741               // start rotating downward
00742                   fIncrement = FALSE;
00743             }
00744             if( iCurrentState == 0)
00745             {
00746                   // rotate colors upward
00747                   fIncrement = TRUE;
00748             }
00749             // if increment upward, increment iCurrentState
00750     if(fIncrement)
00751             {
00752                   iCurrentState++;
00753             }
00754             else
00755             {
00756                   // else downwards
00757                   iCurrentState--;
00758             }
00759         // reset basetime to current clock
00760             uiBaseTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00761       }
00762 
00763 
00764       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
00765       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00766 
00767   // draw line in current state
00768       LineDraw(TRUE, (UINT16) uiNickNameCursorPosition, NICK_NAME_CURSOR_Y, (UINT16)uiNickNameCursorPosition, NICK_NAME_CURSOR_Y + CURSOR_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( GlowColorsList[ iCurrentState ][ 0 ], GlowColorsList[ iCurrentState ][ 1 ], GlowColorsList[ iCurrentState ][ 2 ] ) ), 
00769                pDestBuf );
00770       
00771   InvalidateRegion((UINT16) uiNickNameCursorPosition, NICK_NAME_CURSOR_Y, (UINT16)uiNickNameCursorPosition + 1, NICK_NAME_CURSOR_Y + CURSOR_HEIGHT + 1);
00772  
00773       // unlock frame buffer
00774       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00775       return;
00776 }
00777 
00778 
00779 void DisplayPlayerFullNameString( void )
00780 {
00781 
00782       // this function will grab the string that the player will enter for activation
00783   INT32 iCounter=0;
00784 
00785       // player gone too far, move back
00786       if(uiFullNameCharacterPosition > MAX_FULL_NAME)
00787       {
00788             uiFullNameCharacterPosition = MAX_FULL_NAME;
00789       }
00790 
00791       // restore background
00792       RenderNameIndent( 194, 132);
00793 
00794   // setup the font stuff
00795       SetFont( FONT14ARIAL );
00796   SetFontForeground( 184 );
00797       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
00798 
00799 
00800   // reset shadow
00801       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);      
00802   mprintf(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 196, FULL_NAME_CURSOR_Y + 1, pFullNameString); 
00803   
00804       
00805       fNewCharInString = FALSE;
00806   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00807       return;
00808 }
00809

00811 void DisplayPlayerNickNameString( void )
00812 {
00813 
00814       // this function will grab the string that the player will enter for activation
00815   INT32 iCounter=0;
00816 
00817       // player gone too far, move back
00818       if(uiNickNameCharacterPosition > MAX_NICK_NAME)
00819       {
00820             uiNickNameCharacterPosition = MAX_NICK_NAME;
00821       }
00822 
00823       // restore background
00824       RenderNickNameIndent( 194, 192);
00825 
00826   // setup the font stuff
00827       SetFont( FONT14ARIAL );
00828   SetFontForeground( 184 );
00829       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
00830 
00831 
00832   // reset shadow
00833       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);      
00834   mprintf( LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 196, NICK_NAME_CURSOR_Y + 4, pNickNameString); 
00835   
00836       
00837       fNewCharInString = FALSE;
00838   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00839       return;
00840 }

00842 
00843 void DisplayMaleGlowCursor( void )
00844 {
00845       // this procdure will draw the activation string cursor on the screen at position cursorx cursory
00846   UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
00847       static UINT32 uiBaseTime = 0;
00848       UINT32 uiDeltaTime = 0;
00849   static UINT32 iCurrentState = 0;
00850   static BOOLEAN fIncrement = TRUE;
00851   UINT8 *pDestBuf;
00852 
00853       if(uiBaseTime == 0)
00854       {
00855             uiBaseTime = GetJA2Clock();
00856       }
00857       
00858       // get difference
00859       uiDeltaTime = GetJA2Clock() - uiBaseTime;
00860 
00861       // if difference is long enough, rotate colors
00862       if(uiDeltaTime > MIN_GLOW_DELTA)
00863   {
00864             if( iCurrentState == 10)
00865             {
00866               // start rotating downward
00867                   fIncrement = FALSE;
00868             }
00869             if( iCurrentState == 0)
00870             {
00871                   // rotate colors upward
00872                   fIncrement = TRUE;
00873             }
00874             // if increment upward, increment iCurrentState
00875     if(fIncrement)
00876             {
00877                   iCurrentState++;
00878             }
00879             else
00880             {
00881                   // else downwards
00882                   iCurrentState--;
00883             }
00884         // reset basetime to current clock
00885             uiBaseTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00886       }
00887 
00888       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
00889       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00890 
00891       // draw rectangle
00892   RectangleDraw( TRUE, MALE_BOX_X, MALE_BOX_Y, MALE_BOX_X + MALE_BOX_WIDTH, MALE_BOX_Y + MALE_BOX_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( GlowColorsList[ iCurrentState ][ 0 ], GlowColorsList[ iCurrentState ][ 1 ], GlowColorsList[ iCurrentState ][ 2 ] ) ),  pDestBuf );
00893   
00894       
00895   InvalidateRegion((UINT16) MALE_BOX_X, MALE_BOX_Y,  MALE_BOX_X + MALE_BOX_WIDTH + 1, MALE_BOX_Y + MALE_BOX_HEIGHT + 1);
00896  
00897       // unlock frame buffer
00898       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00899       return;
00900 }

00904 void DisplayFemaleGlowCursor( void )
00905 {

00915       {
00916             uiBaseTime = GetJA2Clock();
00917       }
00918       
00919       // get difference

00921 
00922       // if difference is long enough, rotate colors
00923       if(uiDeltaTime > MIN_GLOW_DELTA)
00924   {
00925             if( iCurrentState == 10)
00926             {
00927               // start rotating downward
00928                   fIncrement = FALSE;
00929             }
00930             if( iCurrentState == 0)
00931             {
00932                   // rotate colors upward
00933                   fIncrement = TRUE;
00934             }
00935             // if increment upward, increment iCurrentState

00937             {

00940             else

00942                   // else downwards

00944             }

00962 
00963 
00964 void CopyFirstNameIntoNickName( void )
00965 {
00966       // this procedure will copy the characters first name in to the nickname for the character
00967       UINT32 iCounter=0;
00968   while( ( pFullNameString[ iCounter ] != L' ' ) && ( iCounter < 20) && ( pFullNameString[ iCounter ] != 0 ) )
00969       {
00970             // copy charcters into nick name
00971             pNickNameString[ iCounter ] = pFullNameString[ iCounter ];
00972             iCounter++;
00973       }
00974 
00975       return;
00976 }
00977 
00978 
00979 void IncrementTextEnterMode( void )
00980 {
00981   // this function will incrment which text enter mode we are in, FULLname, NICKname, IMP_MALE or IMP_FEMALE
00982       
00983       // if at IMP_FEMALE gender selection, reset to full name
00984       if( FEMALE_GENDER_SELECT  == ubTextEnterMode)
00985       {
00986     ubTextEnterMode = FULL_NAME_MODE;
00987       }
00988   else
00989       {
00990             // otherwise, next selection
00991             ubTextEnterMode++;
00992       }
00993 
00994 }
00995 
00996 void DecrementTextEnterMode( void )
00997 {
00998   // this function will incrment which text enter mode we are in, FULLname, NICKname, IMP_MALE or IMP_FEMALE
00999       
01000       // if at IMP_FEMALE gender selection, reset to full name
01001       if(  FULL_NAME_MODE == ubTextEnterMode)
01002       {
01003     ubTextEnterMode =  FEMALE_GENDER_SELECT;
01004       }
01005   else
01006       {
01007             // otherwise, next selection
01008             ubTextEnterMode--;
01009       }
01010 
01011 }

01045 
01046 // mouse regions
01047 
01048 void CreateIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions( void )
01049 {
01050       // this function creates the IMP mouse regions
01051   
01052       // are we only reviewing text?.. if so, do not create regions
01053       if( ubTextEnterMode == 5 )
01054             return;
01055 
01056       // full name region
01057   MSYS_DefineRegion(&gIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions[ 0 ] , LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 196, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 135,  LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 196 + FULL_NAME_REGION_WIDTH, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 135 + 24, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, CURSOR_WWW, 
01058             MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, (MOUSE_CALLBACK)SelectFullNameRegionCallBack );
01059   
01060 
01061       // nick name region
01062       MSYS_DefineRegion(&gIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions[ 1 ] , LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 196, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 195,  LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 196 + NICK_NAME_REGION_WIDTH, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 195 + 24, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, CURSOR_WWW, 
01063             MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, (MOUSE_CALLBACK)SelectNickNameRegionCallBack );
01064 
01065       // IMP_MALE gender area
01066   MSYS_DefineRegion(&gIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions[ 2 ] , MALE_BOX_X, MALE_BOX_Y,   MALE_BOX_X + MALE_BOX_WIDTH, MALE_BOX_Y + MALE_BOX_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, CURSOR_WWW, 
01067             (MOUSE_CALLBACK)MvtOnMaleRegionCallBack, (MOUSE_CALLBACK)SelectMaleRegionCallBack );
01068 
01069       // IMP_FEMALE gender region
01070       MSYS_DefineRegion(&gIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions[ 3 ] , FEMALE_BOX_X, MALE_BOX_Y,   FEMALE_BOX_X + MALE_BOX_WIDTH, MALE_BOX_Y + MALE_BOX_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, CURSOR_WWW, 
01071             (MOUSE_CALLBACK)MvtOnFemaleRegionCallBack, (MOUSE_CALLBACK)SelectFemaleRegionCallBack );
01072 
01073 
01074       // add regions
01075       MSYS_AddRegion(&gIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions[ 0 ]);
01076       MSYS_AddRegion(&gIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions[ 1 ]);
01077       MSYS_AddRegion(&gIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions[ 2 ]);
01078       MSYS_AddRegion(&gIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions[ 3 ]);
01079 
01080       return;
01081 }
01082 
01083 void DestroyIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions( void )
01084 {
01085       // this function destroys the IMP mouse regions
01086 
01087       // are we only reviewing text?.. if so, do not remove regions
01088       if( ubTextEnterMode == 5 )
01089             return;
01090 
01091       // remove regions
01092   MSYS_RemoveRegion(&gIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions[ 0 ]);
01093       MSYS_RemoveRegion(&gIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions[ 1 ]);
01094       MSYS_RemoveRegion(&gIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions[ 2 ]);
01095       MSYS_RemoveRegion(&gIMPBeginScreenMouseRegions[ 3 ]);
01096  
01097 
01098       return;
01099 }
01100 
01101 
01102 void SelectFullNameRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01103 { 
01104       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01105       {
01106 
01107       }
01108       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01109       {
01110 
01111             // set current mode to full name type in mode
01112             ubTextEnterMode = FULL_NAME_MODE;
01113             fNewCharInString = TRUE;
01114       }
01115       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
01116       {
01117       } 
01118 }
01119 
01120 
01121 void SelectNickNameRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01122 { 
01123       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01124       {
01125 
01126       }
01127       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01128       {
01129 
01130             // set mode to nick name type in
01131             ubTextEnterMode = NICK_NAME_MODE;
01132             fNewCharInString = TRUE;
01133       }
01134       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
01135       {
01136       } 
01137 }

01203 
01204 void RenderGender( void )
01205 {
01206   // this procedure will render the gender of the character int he appropriate box
01207 
01208       // check to see if gender has been in fact set
01209   if( bGenderFlag == -1 )
01210   {
01211             // nope, leave
01212             return;
01213       }
01214 
01215       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
01216       SetFontForeground( 184 );
01217       if( bGenderFlag == IMP_MALE )
01218       {
01219             // IMP_MALE, render x in IMP_MALE box
01220             mprintf( MALE_BOX_X + 9, MALE_BOX_Y + 6, L"X" );
01221       }
01222       else
01223       {
01224             // IMP_FEMALE, render x in IMP_FEMALE box
01225             mprintf(FEMALE_BOX_X + 9, MALE_BOX_Y + 6, L"X");
01226       }
01227 }
01228 
01229 void Print8CharacterOnlyString( void )
01230 {
01231 
01232       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
01233       SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
01234       SetFont( FONT12ARIAL );
01235       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);     
01236 
01237       mprintf(iScreenWidthOffset + 430, iScreenHeightOffset + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_DELTA_Y + 228,pIMPBeginScreenStrings[ 0 ]);
01238 
01239       // reset shadow
01240       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);      
01241 
01242 
01243 }
01244 
01245 BOOLEAN CheckCharacterInputForEgg( void )
01246 {
01247 #ifndef JA2BETAVERSION
01248       return( FALSE );
01249 #else
01250 #ifndef _DEBUG
01251       return( FALSE );
01252 #else
01253       if( ( wcscmp( pFullNameString, L"retraC kraM") == 0 ) && ( wcscmp( pNickNameString, L"BdyCnt") ) )
01254       {
01255             wcscpy( pFullNameString, L"Mark Carter");
01256             wcscpy( pNickNameString, L"BodyCount");
01257     bGenderFlag = IMP_MALE;
01258             iHealth = 99;
01259             iAgility = 99;
01260             iStrength = 99;
01261             iDexterity = 99;
01262             iWisdom = 35;
01263             iLeadership = 35;
01264     iMarksmanship = 99;
01265     iMechanical = 0;
01266             iExplosives = 99;
01267             iMedical = 0;
01268             iSkillA = AMBIDEXT;
01269             iSkillB = AUTO_WEAPS;
01270     iPersonality = NO_PERSONALITYTRAIT;
01271             iAttitude = ATT_ASSHOLE;
01272             iCurrentImpPage = IMP_FINISH;
01273             LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId = 1;
01274             iPortraitNumber = 2;
01275         return TRUE;
01276       }
01277       else if ( ( wcscmp( pFullNameString, L"hcnerF evaD") == 0)&&( wcscmp( pNickNameString, L"Feral") == 0))
01278       {
01279     wcscpy( pFullNameString, L"Dave French");
01280             wcscpy( pNickNameString, L"Feral");
01281     bGenderFlag = IMP_MALE;
01282             iHealth = 90;
01283             iAgility = 95;
01284             iStrength = 90;
01285             iDexterity = 95;
01286             iWisdom = 60;
01287             iLeadership = 60;
01288     iMarksmanship = 89;
01289     iMechanical = 40;
01290             iExplosives = 25;
01291             iMedical = 60;
01292             iSkillA = MARTIALARTS;
01293             iSkillB = AUTO_WEAPS;
01294     iPersonality = NO_PERSONALITYTRAIT;
01295             iAttitude = ATT_FRIENDLY;
01296             iCurrentImpPage = IMP_FINISH;
01297             LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId = 1;
01298             iPortraitNumber = 1;
01299         return TRUE;
01300       }
01301       else if ( ( wcscmp( pFullNameString, L"Marnes") == 0)&&( wcscmp( pNickNameString, L"Marnes") == 0))
01302       {
01303     wcscpy( pFullNameString, L"Kris Marnes");
01304             wcscpy( pNickNameString, L"Marnes");
01305     bGenderFlag = IMP_MALE;
01306             iHealth = 100;
01307             iAgility = 100;
01308             iStrength = 100;
01309             iDexterity = 100;
01310             iWisdom = 100;
01311             iLeadership = 100;
01312     iMarksmanship = 100;
01313     iMechanical = 100;
01314             iExplosives = 100;
01315             iMedical = 100;
01316             iSkillA = MARTIALARTS;
01317             iSkillB = AUTO_WEAPS;
01318     iPersonality = NO_PERSONALITYTRAIT;
01319             iAttitude = ATT_FRIENDLY;
01320             iCurrentImpPage = IMP_FINISH;
01321             LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId = 2;
01322             iPortraitNumber = 1;
01323         return TRUE;
01324       }
01325       else if( ( wcscmp( pFullNameString, L"neslO namroN") == 0 ) && ( wcscmp( pNickNameString, L"N.R.G") == 0) )
01326       {
01327             wcscpy( pFullNameString, L"Norman Olsen");
01328             wcscpy( pNickNameString, L"N.R.G");
01329     bGenderFlag = IMP_MALE;
01330             iHealth = 99;
01331             iAgility = 99;
01332             iStrength = 99;
01333             iDexterity = 90;
01334             iWisdom = 70;
01335             iLeadership = 35;
01336     
01337             iMarksmanship = 70;
01338     iMechanical = 65;
01339             iExplosives = 99;
01340             iMedical = 75;
01341             
01342             iSkillA = STEALTHY;
01343             iSkillB = MARTIALARTS;
01344     
01345             iPersonality = NO_PERSONALITYTRAIT;
01346             iAttitude = ATT_AGGRESSIVE;
01347             iCurrentImpPage = IMP_FINISH;
